description: Gets information about a tunnel identified by the unique tunnel id. Requires permission to access the DescribeTunnel action.

nested_items.name: tunnelId
nested_items.description: A unique alpha-numeric ID that identifies a tunnel.

nested_items.name: tunnelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a tunnel.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of a tunnel. Valid values are: Open and Closed.

nested_items.name: sourceConnectionState
nested_items.description: The connection state of the source application.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The connection status of the tunnel. Valid values are CONNECTED and DISCONNECTED.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The last time the connection status was updated.

nested_items.name: destinationConnectionState
nested_items.description: The connection state of the destination application.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The connection status of the tunnel. Valid values are CONNECTED and DISCONNECTED.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The last time the connection status was updated.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the tunnel.

nested_items.name: destinationConfig
nested_items.description: The destination configuration that specifies the thing name of the destination device and a service name that the local proxy uses to connect to the destination application.

nested_items.name: thingName
nested_items.description: The name of the IoT thing to which you want to connect.

nested_items.name: services
nested_items.description: A list of service names that identify the target application. The IoT client running on the destination device reads this value and uses it to look up a port or an IP address and a port. The IoT client instantiates the local proxy, which uses this information to connect to the destination application.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: timeoutConfig
nested_items.description: Timeout configuration for the tunnel.

nested_items.name: maxLifetimeTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The maximum amount of time (in minutes) a tunnel can remain open. If not specified, maxLifetimeTimeoutMinutes defaults to 720 minutes. Valid values are from 1 minute to 12 hours (720 minutes)

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: A list of tag metadata associated with the secure tunnel.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the tunnel was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The last time the tunnel was updated.
